ADLXWrapper
Table of Contents

Namespace ADLXWrapper

Classes

ADLX
ADLX3DSettingsHelpers

Helper methods for 3D Settings services (Anti-Lag, Boost, RIS, etc.).

ADLXApi

Main ADLX API wrapper providing safe access to AMD ADLX Library Implements IDisposable for proper resource cleanup

ADLXDesktopHelpers

Helper methods for desktop and Eyefinity services

ADLXDisplayHelpers

Helper methods for ADLX Display operations.

ADLXDisplaySettingsHelpers

Display settings helpers (FreeSync, GPU scaling, scaling mode, color depth, pixel format, VSR, integer scaling, HDCP, VariBright, display blanking, custom color).

ADLXException

Exception thrown when an ADLX API call fails

ADLXGPUInfo

Compatibility helpers to materialize GPU information from raw pointers.

ADLXGPUTuningHelpers

Helper methods for GPU tuning services

ADLXGpuHelpers

Helper methods for ADLX GPU operations.

ADLXHardwareDetection

Hardware detection utilities for AMD GPU presence.

ADLXHelpers
ADLXListHelpers

Helper methods for ADLX list operations.

ADLXMultimediaHelpers

Helper methods for multimedia settings (video upscale and video super resolution).

ADLXPerformanceMonitoringHelpers

Helper methods for performance monitoring services

ADLXPowerTuningHelpers

Helper methods for power tuning (manual power limit, SmartShift Max/Eco).

ADLXSystemServices

Facade for ADLX performance monitoring services.

AdlxPowerTuning

Facade for power tuning services (SmartShift, manual power/TDC via GPU tuning services).
